name: Raid Encounters
description:
Raid Encounters is an evolution of a pinball-like experience, incorporating the most popular elements from action games and RPGs such as XP, Skill Progression, Loot, Raid Bosses, Combo Systems, and Weapon Upgrades.

Battle through 12 Dungeons filled with unique Monsters and Elite Monsters with a Raid Boss fight at the end of each that will push your digital dexterity skills to the limit as you shoot your Avatar around the dungeon while also moving your Raid Party out of danger's way.

To read through the official Strategy Guide and set up cloud saving through Raid Sync, make sure to visit http://www.raidencounters.com/
